title: crystal violet vaccine
description: Definition of crystal violet vaccine in the Medical Dictionary by The Free Dictionary
cleaned_text: hog cholera vaccines(redirected from crystal violet vaccine) Also found in: [Dictionary](//www.thefreedictionary.com/crystal+violet+vaccine), [Thesaurus](//www.freethesaurus.com/crystal+violet+vaccine), [Encyclopedia](//encyclopedia2.thefreedictionary.com/crystal+violet+vaccine). hog chol·er·a vac·cines vaccines either of virus from blood of infected swine, inactivated with crystal violet, or live virus attenuated in rabbits or tissue culture and frequently used in conjunction with hog cholera virus antiserum.
